works.description: The article titled as "New Feature: Share same post in both Google+ and Facebook Now " was infringed at the reported URL starting with the post excerpt "Folks are going to make their new community at Google plus regardless of whether they have a Facebook account or not. Those who were using Facebook for their social purpose are also giving this new social network a try. While you can add all Facebook friends to Google plus circle(s), sharing your thoughts in both Google plus and Facebook at the same time may be worth for saving your time.". They copied the total content also used the screenshots.
